text: aur jab moosa palat kar apanee qaum kee taraph aae to (ye haalat dekhakar) ranj va gusse mein (apanee qaum se) kahane lage ki tum logon ne mere baad bahut buree harakat kee-tum log apane paravaradigaar ke hukm (mere aane mein) kis kadar jaldee kar baithe aur (taurait kee) takhtiyon ko phenk diya aur apane bhaee (haaroon) ke sar (ke baalon ko pakad kar apanee tar ph kheenchane lage) us par haaroon ne kaha ai mere maanjae (bhaee) mai kya karata qaum ne mujhe haqeer samajha aur (mera kahana na maana) balki qareeb tha ki mujhe maar daale to mujh par dushmanon ko na haisavaie aur mujhe un zaalim logon ke saath na karaar deejie
